name: RI_1_1_3_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Translate_Event
title: RI.1.1.3.1 Evidence of Record Entry Translate Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Translate Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Translate Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when Record Entry content is translated.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entry content is translated.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of translated Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#04
statement.requirement: IF a user initiated a Record Entry content translation, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user initiating Record Entry content translation.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which translated Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., translation).

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entry content is translated.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entry content is translated.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#09
statement.requirement: IF a user initiated a Record Entry translation, THEN the system MAY capture the rationale for translating Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#10
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture a sequence identifier for translated Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#11
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the identifier and version of Translation Tools used for each translated Record Entry.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3.1#12
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture a reference (e.g., link, pointer) to pre-translation data for each Record Entry translation.
